title: Former RBI Governor Rangarajan critiques 16th Finance Commission report
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Former RBI Governor C. Rangarajan
*   Has expressed criticism (critiqued)
*   Regarding the 16th Finance Commission's report.

title: Fishermen to protest proposed inclusion of Loop Road under expansion of Blue Flag Scheme
content:
Fishermen are planning to protest against a specific proposal.
*   The protest concerns the proposed inclusion of the Loop Road.
*   This inclusion is part of the ongoing expansion of the Blue Flag Scheme.

title: Stones pelted, vehicles vandalised as Panipat refinery workers' protest turns violent
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Stones were pelted and vehicles were vandalized during the incident.
*   The violence erupted amidst a protest staged by workers at the Panipat refinery.
*   The workers' demonstration escalated and turned violent.

title: Protest at AI summit: Four more Youth Congress members arrested
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   A protest occurred at an AI summit.
*   Members of the Youth Congress were involved in the demonstration.
*   Four additional Youth Congress members were arrested in connection with the protest.

title: Government blocks 5 OTT platforms for streaming obscene content
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The government has blocked five Over-The-Top (OTT) platforms.
*   The platforms were blocked specifically for streaming obscene content.
*   This action highlights the government's efforts to regulate content on digital streaming services.

title: LDF suspects hidden agenda in Budget to hand over Corporation’s assets to private players
content:
The LDF (Left Democratic Front) suspects a hidden agenda within the recent Budget.
*   This agenda is believed to be aimed at facilitating the transfer of Corporation assets.
*   The assets are allegedly intended to be handed over to private players.

title: Kochi Corporation to issue bonds to mobilise resources for development
content:
Kochi Corporation intends to issue bonds.
*   The bonds are being issued to mobilise financial resources.
*   These resources will be used to fund development projects.

title: Stalin to launch CCTNS 2.0, digital fingerprint collection system on February 26
content:
Stalin will launch a new system called CCTNS 2.0.
*   This system is designed for digital fingerprint collection.
*   The launch is scheduled for February 26.

title: Man booked for pronouncing triple talaq over SMS
content:
A man has been officially booked (charged/accused) by authorities.
*   He faces charges for pronouncing "triple talaq" (instant divorce).
*   The pronouncement was allegedly made and communicated via an SMS message.

title: Southern Railway to pay kilometre allowance after unions protest
content:
Southern Railway has agreed to start paying a kilometre allowance.
*   This decision comes after protests were staged by various unions.
*   The unions' actions successfully pressured the railway into making the payment.
